title: Why does this shit happen?
body:
Sometimes I get the following:


So sad... you are not authorized, (along w a picture of exhaust)

http://images1-1.gamewise.co/368930-small.png






https://i.imgflip.com/2g79jd.jpg

replies.body: bc riot cant code
Therefore the code riots.
\- Descodetes

You can’t upvote or downvote if your below lvl 30 
If it happens and your over lvl 30 hit it again

^^EDIT^^
Sorry if this does not work for you, it just works for me

> [{quoted}](name=DeracadaVenom,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aPt0ukZB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-12T21:25:09.935+0000)
>
> You can’t upvote or downvote if your below lvl 30 
> If it happens and your over lvl 30 hit it again

I'm well above 30.
Try hitting the button twice?? It happens to me to and I’m above 30

> [{quoted}](name=DeracadaVenom,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aPt0ukZB,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-12T22:04:40.918+0000)
>
> Try hitting the button twice?? It happens to me to and I’m above 30

All I have to do is refresh the stupid page but this still bugs me.
You don't have to refresh. Just wait a bit, like 5 seconds until it goes away and then vote again. It's just a feedback error that sometimes occurs.
When it happens to me i have to refresh the page. It often logs me out too as if i was never logged in but if it wasnt logged in i wouldnt get the option to up or down vote
Idk, maybe a problem unique to your browser.

> [{quoted}](name=DeracadaVenom,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aPt0ukZB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-12T21:25:09.935+0000)
>
> You can’t upvote or downvote if your below lvl 30 
> If it happens and your over lvl 30 hit it again

Is lvl 199.
Get's the error. Tries again? Same error occurs. 
"You are bellow level 30.

> [{quoted}](name=DeracadaVenom,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aPt0ukZB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-12T21:25:09.935+0000)
>
> You can’t upvote or downvote if your below lvl 30 
> If it happens and your over lvl 30 hit it again

Then it happens again
Chill, Boards still in beta. :^)

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aPt0ukZB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-13T05:40:02.495+0000)
>
> Chill, Boards still in beta. :^)

Since when?
If you go to main page, there's still BETA tag next to Boards title. It's been in BETA since forever.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aPt0ukZB,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2018-10-13T17:28:40.587+0000)
>
> If you go to main page, there's still BETA tag next to Boards title. It's been in BETA since forever.

Weird, how long have these boards exactly been here? I am aware of what I believe to be the old forums, don't think I was exactly around when this one got made.

> [{quoted}](name=Summonah12369,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aPt0ukZB,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-10-13T08:05:24.324+0000)
>
> Since when?

Since always, through today, and probably continuing permanently.
that's the sharpest version of that meme i've seen so far

It's GOTTA go to Space! Could you give it a minute to get back from space!
Gawd
Some times it just needs some seconds to work, I get it time to time but all I have to do is wait 5-6 seconds.
